name: Pink's Tower
description:
Install instructions

Pink's Tower is a randomly-generated platformer created by one person for /r/gamedev1's first game jam. The purpose of the game is to get the highest score you can by collecting coins and killing enemies while avoiding death.

You control Pink, a silent acrobat, as he double jumps, wall kicks, and dashes his way past increasingly difficult levels in the tower.

This is the first build of the game with only basic functions built in. Basic platforming elements are implemented with more mechanics and enemies to come soon.

Controls: Keyboard and Xbox 360 Controller support so far

Movement: Left and right

Jumping: Z

Dashing: X

Entering doors: up
